name: ADP LLC
sampleDescriptions:
Implementation of Pub. L. No. 115-97, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.
Implementation of Pub. L. No. 115-63, Disaster Tax Relief and Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2017.
Policies affecting payrolls and credits and incentives relating to hiring, including the Work Opportunity Tax Credit, the Indian Employment Credit, and Enterprise Zones.
